verses.verse: And the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> of the <S%H4480>families<s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> came <S%H7126>near,<s%> and <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> <S%H1>fathers<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And they <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> my <S%H113>lord<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> for an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> by <S%H1486>lot<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and my <S%H113>lord<s%> was <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad<s%> our <S%H251>brother<s%> unto his <S%H1323>daughters.<s%>

And if they be <S%H1961>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> to <S%H259>any<s%> of the <S%H4480>sons<s%> <S%H1121><s%> of the other <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> then shall their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be <S%H1639>taken<s%> from the <S%H4480>inheritance<s%> <S%H5159><s%> of our <S%H1>fathers,<s%> and shall be <S%H3254>put<s%> <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> <S%H834>whereunto<s%> they are <S%H1961>received:<s%> so shall it be <S%H1639>taken<s%> from the <S%H4480>lot<s%> <S%H1486><s%> of our <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

And <S%H518>when<s%> the <S%H3104>jubilee<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1961>be,<s%> then shall their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be <S%H3254>put<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> <S%H834>whereunto<s%> they are <S%H1961>received:<s%> so shall their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> be taken <S%H1639>away<s%> from the <S%H4480>inheritance<s%> <S%H5159><s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of our <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> according <S%H5921>to<s%> the <S%H6310>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H3651>well.<s%>

This <S%H2088><s%> is the <S%H1697>thing<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth <S%H6680>command<s%> concerning the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> Let them <S%H1961>marry<s%> <S%H802><s%> to whom they think <S%H2896>best;<s%> <S%H5869><s%> <S%H389>only<s%> to the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of their <S%H1>father<s%> shall they <S%H1961>marry.<s%> <S%H802><s%>

So shall <S%H3808>not<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5437>remove<s%> from <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> <S%H413>to<s%> <S%H4294>tribe:<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1692>keep<s%> himself to the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

And <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> that <S%H3423>possesseth<s%> an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> in any <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> <S%H802>wife<s%> unto <S%H259>one<s%> of the <S%H4480>family<s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of her <S%H1>father,<s%> <S%H4616>that<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> may <S%H3423>enjoy<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%>

Neither <S%H3808><s%> shall the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H5437>remove<s%> from one <S%H4480>tribe<s%> <S%H4294><s%> to <S%H312>another<s%> <S%H4294>tribe;<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> every <S%H376>one<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H1692>keep<s%> himself to his own <S%H5159>inheritance.<s%>

For <S%H4244>Mahlah,<s%> <S%H8656>Tirzah,<s%> and <S%H2295>Hoglah,<s%> and <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> and <S%H5270>Noah,<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> were <S%H1961>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> unto their father's <S%H1730>brothers'<s%> sons: <S%H1121><s%>

And they were <S%H1961>married<s%> <S%H802><s%> into the <S%H4480>families<s%> <S%H4940><s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and their <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H1961>remained<s%> <S%H5921>in<s%> the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of the <S%H4940>family<s%> of their <S%H1>father.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H4687>commandments<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> by the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H6160>plains<s%> of <S%H4124>Moab<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> near <S%H3405>Jericho.<s%>
